name: Before you Die (PipeRift)
description:
Survive the Dreams

Nightmares come back every night. The same dungeon, the same monsters, the same death. 

How many levels will you survive until all your family dies?

Their souls must be saved! Zelian must be Killed!

WHY ByD?

With Before you Die we wanted to experience what working on a rogue-like game is like.

At Piperift we wanted to create another great game after what was Etereo. That's why we came up with the idea of evolving an old LudumDare project, recovering the speed and craziness of old shooters to recombine it with the rogue-like genre. This allowed us to evolve even more as professionals  creating a new, but still evolving experience.

If you decide to play it, we will love to receive your honest feedback!

Do you have any suggestion? Want to see your awesome idea inside the game?
